snippet.title: Raft - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Raft will be released on Steam Early Access 2018! If you want to be notified when it launches, please visit http://store.steampowered.com/app/648800/Raft/ and press 'Add to your wishlist'!

For more information and news, visit: http://www.raft-game.com or follow us at:
Discord: https://discord.gg/raft
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaftSurvivaGame
Facebook: https://facebook.com/RaftGame
